name: McRoberts, Appellant, v. Opfermann et al.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: McRoberts, Appellant, v. Opfermann et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
For the reasons stated in the opinion at No. 186, McRoberts v. Opfermann et al., 360 Pa. 341, the order of the court below is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Zeno Fritz, with him Albert B. Monaco, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
McRoberts, Appellant, v. Opfermann et al.
Argued September 29, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Martin Croissant, for appellant.
Zeno Fritz, with him Albert B. Monaco, for appellees.
November 8, 1948:
